  • Model中Game的使用

    参数类型为Game的Model中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    Player
    Bot.accusable(Game game)
    Iterates playerList find a accusable player.
    void
    Bot.beAccused(Game game)
    When bot is accused, it choose to reveal identity card.
    void
    Player.beAccused(Game game)
    When this player is accused by another player, he performs a series of actions.
    void
    Bot.chooseNextPlayer(Game game)
    Bot randomly chooses a player to play next turn.
    void
    Player.chooseNextPlayer(Game game)
    Choose a player to play next turn
    void
    Bot.discard(Game game)
    Bot randomly discards a card from his hand.
    void
    Player.discard(Game game)
    This player chooses to discard a Rumour card from his hand.
    void
    Bot.playTurn(Game game)
    Bot randomly accuses another player of being a Witch
    void
    Player.playTurn(Game game)
    In this player's turn, he performs a series of actions.
    Player
    Bot.randomChoose(Game game)
    Bot randomly chooses another player.
